channel.title: How do i use update? READ ME PLZ
channel.description: how do i use update properly.... i type ::update 5.... it goes off... and no-one can get back in... i have tried closing runserver.. and loading back up and that just resets... so i dont know :(

item.title: How do i use update? READ ME PLZ
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

Step 1
Open Your Client.java File

Step 2
Serch For

if (command.startsWith

Step 3
At The End Of Your Commands Put…

Code:

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7))+1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();

Step 4
Compile

some servers come with it already built in others don’t

-hope this was some help-
